snippet.title: Swung Trailer || Now available on Itch.io!
snippet.description:
Join our clumsy prince on his quest to defeat the mighty dragon whilst playing as his sword! In this game, you have to make sure the prince gets to the end of the levels whilst trying to defend him from all kinds of harmful creatures or dangerous pitfalls. 


BUY NOW ON https://extra-nice.itch.io/swung


This fairytale comes with 25 playable levels, which is good for 2+ hours of gameplay.


Join our Discord: discord.gg/XYNTtad
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/ExtraNiceGames/
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/extranicegames/
